data.title: Pakistan Economic Survey 2010-11
data.meta_description:
Pakistan Economic Survey 2010-11 - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. The document provides an overview of Pakistan's economy in the past year, highlighting several key points:

1) The economy grew at a rate of 2.4% despite facing multiple crises including floods that caused $10 billion in damage, rising global commodity prices, and ongoing security challenges. 

2) Exports grew strongly at 28% and remittances reached a record high of $11.2 billion, leading to a rare current account surplus. However, inflation increased to 14% and private investment remained weak.

3) The agriculture sector declined 4% due to major crop damage from floods, while manufacturing growth was negligible due to energy shortages and reduced textile/petroleum output. Services grew at
